briefTitle: Improving Identification of Mental Health/Substance Use Disorders in HIV Primary Care: Pilot Clinical Response
officialTitle: Improving Identification of Mental Health/Substance Use Disorders in HIV Primary Care: Pilot Clinical Response

protocolDocument.label: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

eligibilityCriteria.criteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* must be enrolled in the Johns Hopkins Clinical Cohort at the Johns Hopkins Moore Clinic
* must be living with HIV

Exclusion Criteria:

\-

primary.measure: Mental Health or Substance Use Issue Raised in Visit
primary.description: Number of participants for whom review and coding of audio recording captured a mental health or substance use issue during their visit
primary.timeFrame: Visit following intervention which will occur on the same day or up to 1 week after the intervention

primary.measure: Audio Recording Data - Mental Health/Substance Use Action Taken
primary.description: Number of participants for whom review of transcript of clinic visit characterized discussion of mental health issues and referral for services
primary.timeFrame: Visit following intervention which will occur on the same day or up to 1 week after the intervention
